availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in September 17, 1826 in Kentucky. Lived in Christian County, Kentucky. Graduated from Jefferson Medical College in Philadelphia in 1858. Died May 12, 1864.

bibl.p: George M. Gould, ed., The Jefferson Medical College of Philadelphia: Benefactors, Alumni, Hospital, ETC. (New York: The Lewis Publishing Company, 1904), Alumni List 6; Find A Grave, "John N Bass (September 12, 1826 - May 12, 1864)," Memorial #88684817, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88684817&ref=acom (accessed June 27, 2017).; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District No. 2, p. 829; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 92.
